stories.title: Commit after branch merge without false block
stories.i_want: to commit to main after a workflow branch has been merged and deleted
stories.so_that: the branch-guard does not falsely block my commit during the finalize window

stories.title: Block commits when branch still exists
stories.i_want: the branch-guard to still block commits to main when a workflow branch actually exists
stories.so_that: I don't accidentally commit to main instead of the feature branch

stories.title: Read state.json via node -e without block
stories.i_want: to read state.json fields using node -e inline scripts
stories.so_that: diagnostic and read-only state queries are not blocked by the state-file-guard

stories.title: Block write operations via node -e
stories.i_want: node -e commands that write to state.json to still be blocked
stories.so_that: state.json integrity is protected from bash-level writes

stories.title: Consistent treatment of all inline script languages
stories.i_want: python -c, ruby -e, and perl -e to also have script body inspection
stories.so_that: read-only commands in any scripting language are not falsely blocked
